Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Armitage/Lavergne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute at Ellis/54th
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 53rd, Drexel, 55th, and Ellis due to, construction near Ellis/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Update: No trains between Southport and Kimball
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Kimball due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Kimball due to a mechanical problem on a train.

As a result, trains are operating only between Southport and the Loop, downtown, at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service through the affected area.  

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #77 Belmont. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
